parameters.description: First URI for compare. This URI can not contain an asterisk ('*')
parameters.name: uri1

parameters.description: Second URI for compare. This URI can contain asterisk ('*') for substitution if isValuePath is true and currentPath2 is specified.
parameters.name: uri2

parameters.description: The URIs are adaptive value paths. If one of the URIs begins with a single slash '/', both must, and each URI will be parsed as an adaptive value path (example: /adaptorId/objectType/objectId.propertyNames).
parameters.name: isValuePath

parameters.description: If isValuePath is true, this is the current path that is used to resolve a relative path in the URIs. If isValuePath is not true, this parameter is ignored.
parameters.name: currentPath
